name: The Associated Press
description: The Associated Press (AP) is an nonprofit news agency that is owned by its contributing newspapers, radio, and television stations in the United States, all of which contribute stories to the AP and use material written by its staff journalists. The AP API provides access to articles, images, video and supporting elements like taxonomy, geo, author, categories and tags. AP provides a trial period, and pricing upon request for API consumers.

apis.name: AP Content API
apis.description: AP Content API allows you to search and download AP Images content using your own editorial tools, without having to visit the AP Images website.
